data.title: Check My Postcode
data.meta_description: MK40 4HL is a primarily residential postcode in Queens Park, Bedford. Check typical house prices, council tax bands, business rates, broadband availability and local schools. Find nearby hotels and holiday rentals.
data.text:
Summary

MK40 4HL is a primarily residential postcode in Queens Park, Bedford. It was first introduced in January 1980.

The most common council tax band is A.

Residential buildings are typically terraced (including end-terrace), detached and semi-detached. Domestic properties are primarily flats.

Estimated residential property values, based on historical transactions and adjusted for inflation, range from £109,132 to £212,644 with an average of £141,218.

Residential buildings were typically constructed between 1950 and 1966 and between 1967 and 1975.

None of the residential properties sold since 1995 have been new builds or newly converted.

Domestic properties are predominantly social housing.

The most common Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) ratings are C and D.

Commercial rateable values range from £31,000 to £66,000 with an average of £44,667. The most common recorded business types are School and Sports Ground.

Bedford is a town, which had a population of 87,590 in the 2011 census.

In the 2011 census, there were 31 people resident in MK40 4HL, of which 12 were male and 19 were female. This also includes overnight visitors at domestic properties, and residents of non-domestic properties such as hotels, prisons and halls of residence.

MK40 4HL is in the Bedford travel to work area. NHS services are provided by the Bedfordshire Primary Care Trust.

MK40 4HL is approximately 34m (112ft) above sea level.
